column2: "Oh, hi there. Did we have an appointment today or something?"
"Come to think of it, I've been so focused on my research I don't think I've eaten for the past couple days."
"I guess I should take a bit of a break and have some food."
"I'll have to thank Meri for this. Thank you as well for delivering it."
"Oh, right. Since you're here, could I ask a favor of you?"
"I'd like you to deliver this to Tulli."
"I heard his equipment was rather worse for wear, so I arranged to have some things improved."
"By my estimate, he should be in Mistra Forest. Sorry to spring this on you, but I'd really appreciate it."
